definition[0]: middle-of-the-road ideas or opinions are not extreme, and so most people are likely to agree with them
example[0]: a party offering safe, middle-of-the-road policies
definition[1]: middle-of-the-road voters or politicians have ideas that are not extreme
definition[2]: ordinary and not new, different, or exciting
example[1]: Their first album was quite good, but the second was very middle-of-the-road stuff.
